input_email_body:
Subject: Event

Data security event detected in the billing system, possibly exposing patient financial details. This may have occurred due to a recent system update that missed proper security measures My name is John Doe.. Temporary access controls have been put in place and a security review is underway to investigate the situation further. You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.
